Articles.Content:
This is a for a website that will be used to download some of the mods that are not available when the forums are down (it's a disaster isn't it)

if you would like to post your mod on the "Backup forums" please list what the mod is about it's author and the COMPLETE URL this is simply going to be hosted the next time the forums go down (as i said earlier ONLY A FORUM DOWNLOAD BACKUP) i will only post mods i have permission from the original author of the mod and only them.

From

KerbCo
